summary: This bill, the "Over-the-Counter Monograph Drug User Fee Amendments," revises and extends the user fee program for over-the-counter (OTC) monograph drugs. It amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to update definitions, adjust fee structures for facilities, set revenue amounts for 2026-2030, and modify reporting requirements. The bill also includes sunset dates for the authorization and reporting requirements related to the user fee program.
